metadata.title: CVE-2024-36014 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/arm/malidp: fix a possible null pointer dereferenceIn malidp_mw_connector_reset, new memory is allocated with kzalloc, butno check is performed. In order to prevent null pointer dereferencing,ensure that mw_state is checked before calling__drm_atomic_helper_connector_reset.
